item.title: Plot of Duke grade inflation
item.description: Someone sent around a link this morning to data on grade inflation at Duke, which shows a table of average GPAs for undergraduates from 1932 on. Looking at the table you can sort of get a sense of when GPA’s really started increasing (the ’60s), but it would be nicer to just plot them: Or to plot the year over year change in average GPA, with some missing values interpolated:
